title: FSU-SC Scraping
description: Scrapes the entirety of the FSU Scientific Computing departments website and then groups/summarizes groups of text into LaTeX code. It then combines these parts of LaTeX code to then create a pdf with all the required information.

title: House Calculators
description: Can be used to calculate house affordability based on multiple factors. Also utilized for amortization schedule for a mortgage. Written in Python orginally, but rewritten with Javascript and Tailwind CSS interface.

title: Fellowship Finder
description: This project can be used to find fellowships. Currently only looks at Profellow.com, however it will be expanded over time. Has a flask interface, along with Discord functionality hook-up with my Discord Bot "Curator".

title: Llama CPP Wrapper
description: A wrapper for llama.cpp using Django and Flask for local LLM serving.

title: Petunia
description: A CharacterAI clone with personality-driven agents.

title: Manny the Manatee
description: An autonomous Discord agent with specialized tools.

title: Magnification Job Finder
description: Scrapes job boards for specific magnification-related roles.

title: Project Peach
description: A feature-rich calendar clone for personal scheduling.

title: Project Mango
description: A custom autonomous agent for local task automation.

title: Project MIMIC-IV
description: Analyzing and visualizing MIMIC-IV health data.
